org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.mxml

Class MXMLTextData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.common.SourceLocation
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.mxml.MXMLUnitData
        • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.mxml.MXMLTextData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISourceLocation, IMXMLTextData, IMXMLUnitData

    public class MXMLTextData
extends MXMLUnitData
implements IMXMLTextData
    Encapsulation of a block of text in MXML

      • getCompilableText

        public String getCompilableText()
        Description copied from interface: IMXMLTextData
        Gets this unit's compilable text as a String.

        Comments have no compilable text. The compilable text of a CDATA unit is the text between the .

        Specified by:
        getCompilableText in interface IMXMLTextData
        Returns:
        This unit's compilable text.
